definition: to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Can you give me a lift to the next town? ;
sentences.chinese: 可以顺道载我到下一个镇吗？

sentences.english: David about tzu chi Ming fishing, dropping in inquiry learning to protect.
sentences.chinese: 大伟约志明钓鱼，顺道询问学护的表现。

sentences.english: He often comes over to my home.
You can stop by to visit your ex-boss and say hi to them or treat them coffee.
sentences.chinese: 可以顺道拜访旧上司，向他问好或请他喝杯咖啡。

sentences.english: Mark and I flew to Hong Kong and China in September.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫和我在九月时飞返香港，顺道到四川一游。

sentences.english: One day I dropped in on her and found her badly iii.
sentences.chinese: 一天我顺道去看她，发现她病得很重。

sentences.english: I asked him to check the headlight and taillight as well.
sentences.chinese: Gatz帮忙，顺道请他检查车头灯和车尾灯。
你需要顺道共搭一部车吗？

sentences.english: There is one special rule, called taking en- passant .
sentences.chinese: 这里有一个特别的规则，叫做走顺道。

sentences.english: I just come by to say hello.
sentences.chinese: 我只是顺道来打个招呼。

sentences.english: He often drops in to see me.
You may stop by our place on your way to Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 在去上海的途中你可以顺道来我们这儿。

sentences.english: Afternoon, received a detour to see my old Propaganda Minister Gong Xinhan couples.
sentences.chinese: 下午，接待了顺道来看我的中宣部老部长龚心瀚夫妇。

sentences.english: At Jennifer's house, Billy drops by .
sentences.chinese: 比利顺道去珍妮家拜访。

sentences.english: He stopped by with his wife for about five minutes during the trip.
sentences.chinese: 他和妻子在旅游时顺道拜访了我，大约五分钟左右。

sentences.english: I'll drop by sometime next month.
sentences.chinese: 我下个月会找时间顺道去拜访。

definition: by the way/while out doing sth else/conveniently
(do sth) in passing/incidentally (while doing sth else)
just by chance/to happen to (just at the right time)/opportune
another day/some other time/to find another day (for appointment etc)/to take a rain check
to bring sth to sb/to deliver
in a moment/later/also pr. [dai1 hui3 r5] or [dai1 hui5 r5]
to request sb to do sth/please!
no harm (in doing it)/One might as well./It won't hurt./no matter/it's no bother
to roam around/to have a stroll
to act as if/to treat sth as if it were
